definition: seat of honor/person in a high-ranking position/to be promoted to a more senior role/(genetics) epistatic
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
superordinate concept

sentences.english: Chris Hughton will be offered the opportunity to make a quick return to management with Sheffield United.
sentences.chinese: 谢非联为胡顿提供了一个快速上位的教练位子。

sentences.english: This paper contents software development of PLC and PC.
sentences.chinese: 本文的研究工作还包括上位机和下位机的软件开发。

sentences.english: Epistasis was detected for the primary branch.
sentences.chinese: 一次支梗数表现有明显的上位性效应。

sentences.english: This is called an epistatic interaction.
Jens had a few problems, that's why Almunia got his chance.
sentences.chinese: 延斯有一些麻烦，这就是阿穆尼亚上位的原因。

sentences.english: The rule that higher norms are superior to lower ones belongs to priority of validity, and there is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 上位法优于下位法属于效力优先，不存在例外。

sentences.english: PC software is made up on .
For purpose of debugging convenience, a command test program of the LXI Digitizer is developed.
sentences.chinese: 为了调试方便，开发了一个上位机的命令测试程序。

sentences.english: Through VB programmed interface, the super-ordinate computer monitors the boiler's running condition and processes the parameters.
sentences.chinese: 上位机通过由VB程序操作界面，监测锅炉运行情况。

sentences.english: This system consists of PC and machine consisting of two.
sentences.chinese: 该系统由上位机和下位机两大部分组成。

sentences.english: The dark-hair genes are epistatic to the red hair locus .
sentences.chinese: 黑发基因对于红发基因位点来说是上位遗传的。

sentences.english: Fire alarm system is made up of monitoring stations and PC management station.
sentences.chinese: 火灾报警系统由多个监测站和一个上位机管理站组成。

sentences.english: There are two methods for listed files in mutual operation between super-computer and NC system.
sentences.chinese: 数控系统与上位机文件列表互操作有两种方法。

sentences.english: The software interface design of epigynous computer is programmed by language of VB.
sentences.chinese: 该系统上位机界面设计采用VB语言。

sentences.english: The host com puter communicates with each node through CAN bus.
sentences.chinese: 系统上位机通过CAN总线与各个节点进行通信。

sentences.english: Like a game of chess, with the future of the planet as the stakes on the table.
sentences.chinese: 就像象棋对弈，在桌子上位这个星球的未来博弈。

definition: to promote to a higher position
to promote to a higher job/to select for promotion
reaching heaven in a single bound (idiom); (esp. with negative: don't expect) instant success
to take up duty as/to assume a position/to assume/to take on (an office)
to seize power
to rope in/fig. to involve sb/to entice
to stand firmly/to gain a foothold/to establish oneself
to make one's name/to become famous
to abdicate/to yield
favoritism shown to sb because of the influence of the person's wife or other female relative/(by extension) favoritism towards relatives, friends or associates
to be on an equal footing
to overthrow/downfall/to fall from power/to go bankrupt
senior figure/elder/doyen
throne
to select sb for a position without announcing the decision until later/to decide behind closed doors/all cut and dried
place/seat
